text.name: npc_enabled_long
text.text: Enable or disable the living NPC neighborhood system

text.name: npc_max_count_long
text.text: Maximum number of active NPCs in the world

text.name: npc_work_time_long
text.text: Time of day when NPCs work on their fields (24h format)

text.name: npc_favor_frequency_long
text.text: How often NPCs ask for favors (in game days)

text.name: npc_show_names_long
text.text: Display NPC names above their heads

text.name: npc_show_notifications_long
text.text: Show NPC notification messages on screen

text.name: npc_enable_favors_long
text.text: Allow NPCs to ask the player for favors

text.name: npc_debug_long
text.text: Show debug information and NPC paths

text.name: npc_dialog_favor_ask
text.text: Could you help me with something?

text.name: npc_dialog_favor_accepted
text.text: Thank you so much! I'll remember this.

text.name: npc_notification_npc_working
text.text: %s is now working on their field

text.name: npc_dialog_favor_help_request
text.text: Could you help me with something? Check the favor list!

text.name: npc_dialog_favor_nothing
text.text: I don't need anything right now, but thanks for asking!

text.name: npc_dialog_gift_thanks
text.text: Thank you for the gift! That's very generous of you!

text.name: npc_dialog_gift_failed
text.text: Could not give a gift right now.

text.name: npc_greeting_best_friend
text.text: %s, my good friend! Great to see you!

text.name: npc_topic_weather
text.text: The weather has been nice lately, hasn't it?

text.name: npc_topic_crops
text.text: Seen any good crops this season?

text.name: npc_topic_weekend
text.text: Got any plans for the weekend?

text.name: npc_topic_market
text.text: The market prices have been good this season.

text.name: npc_topic_friend
text.text: Good to see you, friend! How have you been?

text.name: npc_topic_harvest_memory
text.text: Remember that time we helped each other with harvest?

text.name: npc_topic_best_neighbor
text.text: You're one of the best neighbors I've had!

text.name: npc_topic_fields_good
text.text: The fields are looking good this year.

text.name: npc_topic_harvest_busy
text.text: Harvest season is always busy but rewarding.

text.name: npc_topic_other_neighbors
text.text: Have you talked to the other neighbors lately?

text.name: npc_topic_gathering
text.text: We should have a neighborhood gathering sometime!

text.name: npc_topic_quiet_day
text.text: Quiet day today. I like it that way.

text.name: npc_work_nothing
text.text: I'm not doing much right now.

text.name: npc_work_idle
text.text: I'm taking a break at the moment.

text.name: npc_work_working
text.text: Working on the field. It's hard work but someone's got to do it!

text.name: npc_work_driving
text.text: Making some deliveries with my vehicle.

text.name: npc_work_resting
text.text: Taking it easy for a while.

text.name: npc_show_favor_list_long
text.text: Show the active favor list on the HUD

text.name: npc_show_rel_bars_long
text.text: Show relationship progress bars when talking to NPCs

text.name: npc_show_map_markers_long
text.text: Show NPC location markers on the map

text.name: npc_enable_gifts_long
text.text: Allow giving gifts to NPCs to improve relationships

text.name: npc_allow_multi_favors_long
text.text: Allow accepting multiple favors at the same time

text.name: npc_max_active_favors_long
text.text: Maximum number of favors you can have active at once

text.name: npc_rel_decay_long
text.text: Relationships slowly decrease over time if not maintained

text.name: npc_favor_management_footer
text.text: Cancel favor to reduce relationship by 10 | Complete to finish manually

text.name: npc_hud_locked_long
text.text: When locked, the favor list cannot be moved with F8

text.name: npc_hud_scale_long
text.text: Size of the active favors list on screen

text.name: npc_admin_subtitle_fmt
text.text: %d active NPCs | Click Edit to adjust relationship

text.name: npc_admin_no_npcs
text.text: No active NPCs. NPCs will appear after initialization.

text.name: npc_admin_footer
text.text: Click Edit to adjust NPC relationship values
